name: NSWindow.Level
desc: The standard window levels in macOS.

items.name: static let mainMenu: NSWindow.Level
items.desc: Reserved for the applicationâ€™s main menu.

items.name: static let modalPanel: NSWindow.Level
items.desc: The level for a modal panel.

items.name: static let normal: NSWindow.Level
items.desc: The default level for NSWindow objects.

items.name: static let popUpMenu: NSWindow.Level
items.desc: The level for a pop-up menu.

items.name: static let screenSaver: NSWindow.Level
items.desc: The level for a screen saver.

items.name: static let statusBar: NSWindow.Level
items.desc: The level for a status window.

items.name: static let submenu: NSWindow.Level
items.desc: Reserved for submenus. Synonymous with NSTornOffMenuWindowLevel, which is preferred.

items.name: static let tornOffMenu: NSWindow.Level
items.desc: The level for a torn-off menu. Synonymous with NSSubmenuWindowLevel.

items.name: init(Int)
items.desc: Creates a window level using the given integer value.

items.name: init(rawValue: Int)
items.desc: Creates a window level using the given raw value.
